/* Add to android/app/build.gradle inside android { signingConfigs { release { ... } } } */
signingConfigs {
    release {
        storeFile file("keys/teaestate_key.jks")
        storePassword project.hasProperty('STORE_PASSWORD') ? STORE_PASSWORD : "your_store_password_here"
        keyAlias project.hasProperty('KEY_ALIAS') ? KEY_ALIAS : "teaestate_key"
        keyPassword project.hasProperty('KEY_PASSWORD') ? KEY_PASSWORD : "your_key_password_here"
    }
}
